key.description: Unlock additional capabilities with your license key. To purchase a license, visit our website http://xviz.com

fontfamily.description: Applied to all the text in the visual

enumeration.value: Lucida Grande, Lucida Sans Unicode, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

trellisBreadCrumbs.description: Breadcrumbs will be displayed while drilling down the hierarchical data in Categroies

trellisSpecialSeriesType.description: Series Type for Special Trellis chart
trellisSpecialSeriesType.displayName: Series Type for Special Trellis chart

dashStyle.description: A name for the dash style to use for the line connecting the columns of the waterfall series.

fontColor.description: Select the Font Color of the Axis Title and Labels

valueFontColor.description: Change the color of the values displayed within the nodes

axisBreakScaling.description: Y axis scaling for better viewing of the variance values

yAxisShownthLabel.description: Select the intervel on which you want to see the X Axis Labels

innerPadding.description: Inner Padding as a percentage of the category width

xAxisReverse.description: Choose to have the Values on the Axis displayed from right to Left

xAxisShowNthLabel.description: Select the interval on which you want to see the X Axis Labels

dlXOffset.description: X axis offset Value to better positioning of data labels

dlYOffset.description: Y axis offset Value to better positioning of data labels

markerColor.description: Enable marker coloring for data label formats

dlNoOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to displayed in the values

negativeValueFormat.description: Select the number format for  Negative values

positiveValueFormat.description: Select the number format for  Positive values

semanticFormatting.description: Colors for underlying Data Format Types

variance.description: To set the title for Variance

varianceDecimalPlaces.description: This will be applied to the values shown in datalabel

variancePercentage.description: To set the title for the Variance Percentage

varianceScalingDisplay.description: This will scale the value which is displayed in datalabel

gridColumnCount.description: Number of columns to be displayed in grid

gridRowCount.description: Number of rows to be displayed in grid
